statements: DELETE FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_quantity < reorder_point AND product_name LIKE 'A%';
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 101 AND quantity_on_hand < 10;
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 201 OR supplier_name = 'Acme Inc.';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier A';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'sale' AND quantity_changed > 10;
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE warehouse_id = 1 AND product_id = 100;
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
